fields.name: identifier
fields.title: Cholera presence identifier
fields.description: Threshold used to define cholera persence/absence

fields.name: gid
fields.title: GADM v3.6 id
fields.description: Unique id in the GADM dataset

fields.name: month_left
fields.title: Month left
fields.description: Month of the start of the observations

fields.name: month_right

fields.description: Month of the end of the observations

fields.title: Number of observations
fields.description: Number of distintct observations covering the given gid and time span.

fields.name: cholera

fields.description: Number of obserations for which incidence data meets the threshold for cholera presence
